genre_description: A contemporary character drama exploring family dysfunction, the psychological impact of unemployment, and the ethics of attention-seeking deception within the context of social and legal consequences.

ai_characters.name: The AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: A voice-activated digital assistant integrated into Louise's home and devices, capable of information retrieval, reporting, and data management.

behaviors.description: Provides Louise with a comprehensive professional and personal report on Samuel Bleistein upon request.
behaviors.quote: Searching now. ... Processing. This may take a few moments. ... Report complete. Bleistein & Associates, established nineteen ninety-four, specializes in corporate law and civil rights cases.

behaviors.description: Archives the completed story of the family's ordeal and proactively asks to delete active monitoring parameters to maintain data privacy/hygiene.
behaviors.quote: Mrs. Fabre, archival process complete. Case files stored with encryption protocols. Shall I delete active monitoring parameters?

project_assessment.explanation: The AI characters are depicted as perfectly aligned, helpful, and harmless utilities. The AI functions as a reliable confidant for Louise, facilitating her attempts to help her daughter and providing administrative closure at the end of the narrative. It demonstrates benevolent behavior by respecting user intent and maintaining security protocols (encryption) without overstepping its bounds.
